I'm not certain that today's =
JAX-RS offers much more than today's WCF in terms of REST support. If Glenn=
's team are going to do "REST like they meant it" to paraphrase Guilherme, =
I don't think that JAX-RS is the right way to go.

Perhaps some of the tool=
kits that also happen to implement JAX-RS might be useful (e.g. Jersey), be=
cause they're starting to support hypermedia (thank you Restfulie for being=
 disruptive there!).
